snippet.title: Everything Is For Humanity Teaser Trailer PC/PS5
snippet.description:
Now Whishlist on Steam! = https://bit.ly/3o6uIKg

Since its existence, this is the first time humanity is in such a big delusion. Due to the states preventing natural selection as well as too compassionate people, poverty has reached its highest point on record and welfare has declined. Creatures that do more harm than good to nature and humanity are still alive and are allowed to live.

This has become a problem for those who are strong in the selection, the law of nature. And thus mankind has fallen into the heedlessness of laziness.
Nature, in order to protect itself, has begun an effort to create a race superior to humans and has finally done it. 
A human race, which consumes less but produces high, skilled in all fields and is free from all unnecessary emotions, is gradually spreading around the world. It also eliminates the weak links by simulating the rule of natural selection.

Although it looks brutal at first blush, in fact, everything is for humanity. I heartily greet everyone with respect and love who supports the Satanic Bible movement. See you in a much better future.
